items.title: Lil Nas X pleads not guilty to four felony charges after LA arrest
items.description: The rapper, whose legal name is Montero Lamar Hill, was detained last week while wandering the streets in his underwear.

items.title: French helicopter crew survive crash into lake
items.description: The helicopter was attempting to collect water to fight wildfires at the time of the crash.

items.title: Israeli double strike on Gaza hospital - what we know
items.description: Netanyahu said it was a "tragic mishap" but did little to address the apparent "double-tap" nature of the attack.

items.title: Five journalists among 20 killed in Israeli double strike on hospital
items.description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said it was a "tragic mishap" and promised a "thorough investigation".

items.title: Mexico cartel leader 'El Mayo' enters guilty plea
items.description: Ismael "El Mayo" Zambada was arrested in July 2024, and is due to be sentenced in the coming months.
